oracle.xml.pipeline.controller
Class PipelineDoc

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--oracle.xml.pipeline.controller.PipelineDoc
public class PipelineDoc
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates the pipeline doc, which forms the input to the pipeline execution.
